settings.title: Vented Humidity Dome
settings.description: A professional propagation dome for starting seeds or cuttings. Temperature and humidity controlled by two adjustable vents for better growing results. Designed to provide more cubic volume for your growing plants. Constructed from heavy duty, high grade plastic to maximize light penetration and stand up to repeated use. Perfectly fitted for standard 10 x 20 trays, to create a tight seal and reduce moisture loss.

settings.title: T5 Grow Light
settings.description: Super Sprouter® now offers the 18 in T5 High Output Grow Light fixture with the nano-tech reflector. This fixture includes an integrated electronic ballast, 6400° K lamp, power cord, jumper cord and mounting clips (hanging and flat surface). You can daisy chain up to 8 lights per single power cord. The reflector uses nanotechnology to maximize reflection

settings.title: Heat Mat
settings.description: Warms root area approximately 10–20° F over ambient temperature to improve germination process. Helps gardeners have better success rates with seedlings and cuttings. Perfect for one standard 10 in x 20 in propagation tray. Heavy-duty construction makes this mat very durable. More than 20% larger than competitive mats. This allows even warming of your entire tray. More consistent heating with fewer hot spots than other seedling heat mats. Ed Hume seal of approval. 2

settings.title: Clonex Gel
settings.description: Clonex Gel is a high performance rooting compound that remains in contact with the stem, sealing the cut tissue and supplying the hormones needed to promote root cell development and vitamins to protect the delicate new root tissue. Clonex has a full spectrum of mineral nutrients and trace elements to nourish the young roots.

settings.title: Digital Timer
settings.description: The Apollo® 7 - 24 hr digital timer is the perfect timing solution for your hydro systems. With a 15 Amp capacity, it's easy to set to run your pumps, fans, etc. The Apollo® 7 may be set to 1 min intervals and run 8 separate schedules per day. Can be configured in numerous timing schedules to meet the most demanding timing requirements. One (1) outlet with 1 min intervals. Battery backup feature saves settings if power goes out. Enclosure resists dust, rust and moisture. 15 Amps maximum/120 V/60 Hz. HINT: If not working properly, plug in for 5 min and press the reset button. Generally this fixes the problem.

settings.title: Square Pots
settings.description: 2.5 inch Press & Fill pots for T.O. Plastics Press & Fill SystemYou can find the trays these pots fit in here.

settings.title: Plant Starter Cubes
settings.description: Sponge Cubes are an all-natural, eco-friendly, seed starting solution perfect for use in both soil and hydroponic applications. Their extremely spongy texture provides a superior ability to retain moisture and results in an optimal air-to-water ratio. The cubes also provide even dry downs for further root development making these sponge cubes great for both seeds and clones. The Sponge Cubes make transitioning your grows easy by allowing you to plant them directly into soil or any hydroponic system either indoors or outdoors. DaPlug Sponge Cubes are proven to stimulate more root growth and can provide year round reliable germination and healthy root development for your plants!

settings.title: 50 Cell Seedling Tray
settings.description: 50 Cell Seedling Tray insert, fits into 10"X20" tray.

settings.title: Everything you need seed starting kit
settings.top-of-page: Students, be sure to use your discount codes at checkout. The code should be supplied by your school.

settings.title: Rapid Rooter Tray w/ Plugs
settings.description: Rapid Rooter® plugs are all natural soilless grow plugs made of composted tree bark and organic materials. These plugs are perfect for seedlings or cuttings. Transplant plugs in soil or soilless hydrogardening applications. Tray is 10"x 20".
